import React from 'react'; import { Col, Row, Container, Breadcrumb } from 'react-bootstrap'; import Documentation from "components/Documentation"; export default () => { return (

Breadcrumbs

Use breadcrumbs to indicate the navigational hierarchy of the current page.

Use the <Breadcrumb> component to show a clear navigational hierarchy for your users, wherever they may be on a given page. Using the variant modifier props you can update the color of the component.

} scope={{ Row, Col, Breadcrumb }} imports={`import { Breadcrumb } from 'react-bootstrap';`} example={` Home Library Data Home Library Data Home Library Data Home Library Data `} /> In order to make the <Breadcrumb> component transparent, all you need to do is add the breadcrumb-transparent modifier class to the parent component.

} scope={{ Row, Col, Breadcrumb }} imports={`import { Breadcrumb } from 'react-bootstrap';`} example={` Home Library Data Home Library Data Home Library Data Home Library Data `} />
); };
